projects: [{"title":"IPO Underpricing in India","start_date":"Sep 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"Explained underpricing for 334 IPOs during 2005-15 by developing 3 regression modelsEvaluated impact of 21 variables viz. Anchor Investors, promoter holding & PE/VC backing "},{"title":"Biofuel Production using Ethanol","start_date":"Jan 2017","end_date":"Apr 2017","description":"Developed an estimate for a 600 TPD plant for 99.5% pure fuel grade ethanol from Lignocellulosic BiomassExpected profits of INR 1.26 billion; identified efficient processes and location to optimize supply chain"},{"title":"IFRS adoption in India","start_date":"Jan 2016","end_date":"Feb 2016","description":"Identified 65 financial events affecting IFRS in India during 2009-15; also surveyed the reaction in EuropeAnalysed data from BSE, NSE (using R), interpreted the impact of these events on IFRS adoption in India"}]
